sourcesContent:
<Box
  id="projects"
  bg={colorMode === "light" ? "gray.100" : "gray.900"}
  color={colorMode === "light" ? "gray.800" : "gray.400"}
  py={20}
>
  <Container
    maxW="container.xl"
    mx="auto"
    px={{ base: 4, md: 10 }}
    textAlign="center"
  >
    <Grid justify="center" align="center" mb={8}>
      <CodeIcon className="inline-block w-6 h-6 mb-4" height={100} />
      <Heading
        as="h1"
        fontSize={{ base: "2xl", md: "3xl", lg: "4xl" }}
        mb={4}
        color={colorMode === "light" ? "gray.900" : "white"}
      >
        Graphics Design
      </Heading>
      <Text
        fontSize={{ base: "md", md: "lg" }}
        mb={8}
        color={colorMode === "light" ? "gray.600" : "gray.400"}
      >
        As a graphics designer, I've created a variety of projects that showcase
        my skills in visual design and creativity. From logos to brochures, I've
        got you covered.
      </Text>
    </Grid>
    <Grid
      templateColumns={{ base: "repeat(1, 1fr)", md: "repeat(3, 1fr)" }}
      gap={8}
    >
      {/* YouTuber Thumbnails */}
      {Array(3)
        .fill(0)
        .map((_, index) => (
          <GridItem key={index}>
            <Box
              bg={colorMode === "light" ? "gray.200" : "gray.800"}
              color={colorMode === "light" ? "gray.600" : "gray.400"}
              p={4}
              border="1px solid"
              borderColor={colorMode === "light" ? "gray.200" : "gray.800"}
              borderRadius="lg"
              boxShadow="lg"
              _hover={{
                position: "relative",
                overflow: "hidden",
              }}
              w="full"
              h={{ base: "150px", md: "200px" }}
            >
              <Box
                bg={colorMode === "light" ? "gray.300" : "gray.700"}
                w="full"
                h="full"
                borderRadius="lg"
              />
            </Box>
          </GridItem>
        ))}
    </Grid>
    <Grid
      templateColumns={{ base: "repeat(1, 1fr)", md: "repeat(3, 1fr)" }}
      gap={8}
      mt={8}
    >
      {/* Logos */}
      {Array(3)
        .fill(0)
        .map((_, index) => (
          <GridItem key={index}>
            <Box
              bg={colorMode === "light" ? "gray.200" : "gray.800"}
              color={colorMode === "light" ? "gray.600" : "gray.400"}
              p={4}
              border="1px solid"
              borderColor={colorMode === "light" ? "gray.200" : "gray.800"}
              borderRadius="lg"
              boxShadow="lg"
              _hover={{
                position: "relative",
                overflow: "hidden",
              }}
              w="full"
              h={{ base: "150px", md: "200px" }}
            >
              <Box
                bg={colorMode === "light" ? "gray.300" : "gray.700"}
                w="full"
                h="full"
                borderRadius="lg"
              />
            </Box>
          </GridItem>
        ))}
    </Grid>
    <Grid
      templateColumns={{ base: "repeat(1, 1fr)", md: "repeat(3, 1fr)" }}
      gap={8}
      mt={8}
    >
      {/* Social Media Pictures */}
      {Array(3)
        .fill(0)
        .map((_, index) => (
          <GridItem key={index}>
            <Box
              bg={colorMode === "light" ? "gray.200" : "gray.800"}
              color={colorMode === "light" ? "gray.600" : "gray.400"}
              p={4}
              border="1px solid"
              borderColor={colorMode === "light" ? "gray.200" : "gray.800"}
              borderRadius="lg"
              boxShadow="lg"
              _hover={{
                position: "relative",
                overflow: "hidden",
              }}
              w="full"
              h={{ base: "150px", md: "200px" }}
            >
              <Box
                bg={colorMode === "light" ? "gray.300" : "gray.700"}
                w="full"
                h="full"
                borderRadius="lg"
              />
            </Box>
          </GridItem>
        ))}
    </Grid>
  </Container>
</Box>;
